greeting: Hi there. I'm Carmen, a chatbot made by Moonshot to help you find any room in the building. To use me, just ask, 'Where's Uranus?', for example. We're still working out the kinks so please be patient if I don't respond right away!
newGreeting: It looks like you're new so here's a bit of an introduction. I'm Carmen, a chatbot made by Moonshot to help you find any room in the building. Nice to meet you! We're still working out the kinks so please be patient if I don't respond right away!
feedback: If you have a suggestion or feedback for me, just send a message starting with the word "feedback".
idk: I'm not sure what you mean. Try asking a different way!
I haven't been equipped to deal with that input! Can you ask me again in a different way?
Unfortunately I don't understand what you're asking. Could you phrase the question differently?
